message.body: so it looks like it'll be just us tomorrow!
Do you want to go to Sunday school or just the service?
I want to know when you receive this but I'm going to the service and not Sunday school!!
Alrighty well I have a case of food poisoning right now! Really hope you see this but church isn't happening tomorrow :( I'm so sorry!
oh gosh sorry i did see this! i'll text one of my other people. feel better soon!
Thanks! I'm sorry I couldn't take you, but hopefully I'll be better by tonight.
